amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1 million for the Bureau of Indian Affairs for the Office of Federal Acknowlegement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $1,000,000 in funding regarding Operation of Indian Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Shays.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
